attributes.action: Provide sanctuary to refugees from Ukraine
attributes.additional_details: I want the Government to help innocent people fleeing war in the middle of Europe.
attributes.background: This petition calls to allow visa free travel into the U.K. to Ukrainian refugees fleeing military invasion of their country. We should open up our borders and provide safe haven to these innocent people.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Wave visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530

Offer fast track asylum to any Ukrainians displaced due to the invasion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
